# Museum of Islamic Cultural Heritage and Al-Quran Learning Center

| location        = Yi-ngo District, Narathiwat Province, Thailand

}}
The Museum of Islamic Cultural Heritage and Al-Quran Learning Center (; ) is a museum in Yi-ngo district, Narathiwat province, Thailand. The museum focuses on Malay history, including manuscripts and artifacts from the Malay Peninsula.
History
The museum opened in 2010, and features exhibition rooms displaying Quran manuscripts, Malay manuscripts, and ancient Malay technology. The museum's collections including 79 handwritten copies of the Quran.
In 2023, Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin toured the museum. The museum opened to the public in 2024.
